Posts.Content: Feb 5, 2012 08:12PM - edited Feb 5, 2012 08:21PM by Itzme Eileen:  I am beginning treatment #1 of 4 TCH treatments this week.  I will have herceptin for one year.  My oncologist did not really give me a choice and I want to trust his decision for me so I am trying not to second guess his judgment.  This seems to be the standard for stage 1, negative nodes, Her2+ in our area and the onc thought this was aggressive treatment?  Can anyone tell me what to expect for SE from the TCH and how long I should plan to miss work??
